narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "C" exhibitors license.  
The license fee of $75.00 should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
The exit briefing conducted with the owner.
No Regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
